name: Mindungeon
description:
A simple platform dungeon 3d game with only one level. The game was made in a gamejam of 1 week.  You're in the skin of Kikkin, A knight with the power of dash and jump.

The team was composed by:

  • Me - As Game Designer
  • Matheus Antonius - As 3d Artist
  • Hicaro Silva - Game Developer
